fields.name: Flask
fields.description: A cloud development environment preconfigured for building and running Flask web applications.

fields.name: C
fields.description: A cloud development environment preconfigured for C programming with Make and the Clang compiler, optionally switchable to GCC.

fields.name: ExpressJS
fields.description: A cloud development environment preconfigured for building and running Express.js web applications.

fields.name: RStudio
fields.description: A cloud development environment preconfigured for building and running R applications using the RStudio IDE and including Tidyverse.
